name: dark_botanical
description: Centered content on dark. Abstract soft shapes in corner.
signature_elements: No illustrations â€” only abstract CSS shapes
extra_css: .accent-circle { position: absolute; border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(80px); opacity: 0.4; z-index: 0; } .circle-warm { background: var(--accent); width: 300px; height: 300px; top: -100px; right: -50px; } .circle-pink { background: #e8b4b8; width: 200px; height: 200px; bottom: -50px; left: -30px; } .accent-line { width: 1px; height: 60px; background: var(--accent); margin: 1.5rem auto; }
